creditline: Gift of Dr. Richard L. Simmons in honor of Lotus Stack
description: thick, padded fabric kimono; indigo torso and arms with light blue, grey and white leaf motif repeating below waist; large light blue, grey and white bird with many feathers and red head crest across upper back; green bands of fabric around edges of sleeves and around bottom; green lining throughout; blue collar with white floral pattern and butterfly-like motif; green rectangles at bottoms of flared flaps at front opening near waist; off-white stitching along seams and individual tied stitches throughout indigo areas through all layers
title: Sleeping kimono
